name: Lize Helesta リゼ・ヘルエスタ / Nijisanji
description:
weight 0.7 is best. (There may be differences between checkpoint models.)

I created this LoRA as requested.

Please read the description.

설명을 참고해주세요.

outfit1 (normal)
lh1, hair ornamnet, long hair, long sleeves, pleated skirt, blue thighhighs, armband, frilled skirt, white jacket, white shirt, blue skirt, thigh strap


outfit2 (white dress)
lh1, hair flower, long hair, white dress, bare shoulders, collarbone, short sleeves


outfit3 (princess)
lh1, long hair, tiara, blue dress, jewelry, white gloves, earrings, choker, frills, braid, puffy short sleeves


outfit4 (serafuku + cardigan)
lh1, hair ornament, long hair, ponytail, open cardigan, blue cardigan, white sailor collar, long sleeves, blue ribbon, school uniform, serafuku


outfit5 (serafuku)
lh1, hairclip, short hair, white sailor collar, blue shirt, long sleeves, blue ribbon, school uniform, serafuku


outfit6 (sweater dress)
lh1, hairclip, braid, pantyhose, brown dress, wristwatch, long sleeves, turtleneck sweater, jewelry, black pantyhose, floral print, hair over shoulder, pink dress, black sweater

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.

The four types of hairstyles - long hair, short hair, ponytail, and braid - can be applied to any outfit.

And hairclip ↔ hair ornament swap is possible.
